attributes.action: Do not allow people into our country without a job, and therefore likely to get benefits.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Our benefit system and our country in general, are already over stretched, but we still allow people into our country who are emediately going to get some sort of benefit. How mad's that. Stop this now, sign this petition, tell all your friends, and lets get millions of votes.
Thanks....Kevin Snowdon
